Generation IX.Scarlet: It has underdeveloped electric sacs on its cheeks. These sacs can produce electricity only if Pawmi rubs them furiously with the pads on its forepaws.
Generation IX.Violet: The pads of its paws are electricity-discharging organs. Pawmi fires electricity from its forepaws while standing unsteadily on its hind legs.

Generation IX.Scarlet: South Province: Area One , Area Two , Area Three , Area Five , Poco Path West Province: Area One Area Zero Tera Raid Battles ( 1★ )
Generation IX.Violet: South Province: Area One , Area Two , Area Three , Area Five , Poco Path West Province: Area One Area Zero Tera Raid Battles ( 1★ )
